inputs.remark: 缺少October 2019就诊，缺少January 2020就诊，visit顺序重新排列

logic_summary: Added missing October 2019 visit at index 2 (chronologically between June and November 2019).
Added missing January 2020 visit at index 4 (chronologically between November 2019 and September 2020).
Ensured visits are chronologically ordered: May 2019, June 2019, Oct 2019, Nov 2019, Jan 2020, Sept 2020.

history.present_illness: Patient reported ongoing pulsatile tinnitus and requested further adjustments.
history.otologic_history: Wore devices until October 2019 with persistent symptoms.
history.prior_management: New open jaw earmold impressions made of the left ear canal. Left device sent back to manufacturer for remake with a larger vent.

history.present_illness: Patient remained aware of the pulsatile tinnitus.
history.medical_psych_history: Pacemaker placed in December 2019. Cardiologist evaluation reported no findings.
history.prior_management: Manufacturer audiologist assessed physical fit. Devices sent to manufacturer to replicate physical fitting of previous devices. Cardiologist recommended gain reduction (2000-4000 Hz), which was attempted but failed.
